Reviews.Title: As advertised
Reviews.Author: mat
Reviews.Content: this order is in a good term and condition as written in the page of order received in time in a shape sa shown in the picture

Reviews.Title: the samsung sgh-a237 black
Reviews.Author: Leo
Reviews.Content: I received the phone what I had ordered. However, the size of the battery doesn't fit the phone because the battery is too thick. The back cover doesn't want to close and clip properly. Fortunately, I only needed the phone, so I used my old battery.

Reviews.Title: SGH-A237 does the basics very well.
Reviews.Author: Benjamin T Painter
Reviews.Content: The family has three Samsung A237s.  These phones are used in France, USA, Netherlands and Ireland with a variety of interchangable SIM cards.  Changing cards and frequencies is very easy.  Compact clamshell size makes them perfect for travel.  Battery life is very good as is sound quality both sending and receiving.

Reviews.Title: not what was sent
Reviews.Author: hsc
Reviews.Content: I ordered the phone that is pictured here. It is not what I got. I really like the Samsung sgh-a237 phones what i got was the samsung sgh-a227. There's no bluetooth and no camera. I don't really need a camera, but the bluetooth would be nice. I only paid $25 for the phone so I'm debating on sending it back. I got this from an individual so I think he only has 1 to sell, but in case I do send it back, I thought the next person might want to know you're not getting what you see.
